snippet: The French Army said it had killed Ahmed al-Tilemsi, who had a $5 million bounty on his head and led one of the main brigades of a Qaeda splinter group.
abstract: French troops kill terrorist leader Ahmed al-Tilemsi in deserts of Mali; Tilemsi had a $5 million bounty on his head after State Dept listed him as a global terrorist.

byline.original: By RUKMINI CALLIMACHI and AURELIEN BREEDEN
byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi reported from Istanbul, and Aurelien Breeden from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The French Army said it had killed Ahmed al-Tilemsi, who had a $5 million bounty on his head and led one of the main brigades of a Qaeda splinter group.

headline.main: French Forces Kill a Leader of Jihadists in Mali Raid
headline.print_headline: French Forces Kill a Leader of Jihadists in Mali Raid

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb

keywords.value: Mujao (Movement for Oneness and Jihad in West Africa)
